title: Update Contact page email to awarenessoveraddictionofficial@gmail.com

requirements.text: Update the email address shown on the existing Contact page (India Support Contact) to exactly "awarenessoveraddictionofficial@gmail.com", including both the visible text and the mailto: link.
acceptanceCriteria: On /contact, the displayed email text is "awarenessoveraddictionofficial@gmail.com" (no typos).
On /contact, clicking the email link uses href="mailto:awarenessoveraddictionofficial@gmail.com".
No phone number is added to the Contact page.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything in frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not add or change any phone number on the Contact page.
Do not implement backend persistence or a contact form submission flow.
Do not change Instagram handle/link unless explicitly requested.
